IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO COMMUNICATE QUAKER EXPERIENCE IN ORDER TO CONNECT AND DEEPEN SPIRITUAL LIVES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO COMMUNICATE QUAKER EXPERIENCE IN ORDER TO CONNECT AND DEEPEN SPIRITUAL LIVES.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION DISTRIBUTES FRIENDS JOURNAL EACH MONTH TO SUBSCRIBERS AND REQUESTING INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS NATIONWIDE AND THROUGHOUT THE WORLD. EACH PERIODICAL CONTAINS ARTICLES AND ADVERTISEMENTS RELEVANT TO THE QUAKER COMMUNITY. THE MAGAZINE RELIES ON SUBSCRIPTION AND ADVERTISING FEES ALONG WITH CONTRIBUTIONS AND GRANTS, MAINLY FROM RELIGIOUS SOCIETY OF FRIENDS INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS, TO SUSTAIN ITS ABILITY TO SHARE ITS MESSAGE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PRODUCES VIDEOS UNDER THE FRIENDS JOURNAL AND QUAKERSPEAK BRANDS, DISTRIBUTED ONLINE AND IN DVD FORMAT, THAT COMMUNICATE, EXPLORE AND EDUCATE VIEWERS ABOUT IMPORTANT ASPECTS OF QUAKER FAITH AND PRACTICE. THE VIDEOS WERE VIEWED OVER 400,000 TIMES IN THE MOST RECENT FISCAL YEAR. THE PROGRAM IS SUPPORTED BY GRANTS, CONTRIBUTIONS, AND PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENTS WITH OUTSIDE QUAKER NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, AS WELL AS THE ORGANIZATION'S GENERAL REVENUES.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUSTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS INCOME DERIVED IS USED TO SUPPORT THE PROGRAM PURPOSE OF PUBLISHING FRIENDS JOURNAL 11 TIMES PER YEAR.

UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS UNDER ASC740: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED AN ACCOUNTING STANDARD REGARDING UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE STANDARD PRESCRIBES A MINIMUM THRESHOLD THAT A TAX POSITION IS REQUIRED TO MEET IN ORDER TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT IT HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS DEFINED IN THE STANDARD.

CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE GIFT ANNUITIES -6,753. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUSTS 8,508. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUSTS -1,000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING BOARD REVIEW OF FORM 990 PRIOR TO ITS FILING WITH THE IRS, AN ELECTRONIC COPY OF THE FINAL FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MONITORING AND ENFORCEMENT OF CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED AT THE ANNUAL MEETING OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE TRUSTEES ARE ASKED TO UPDATE THEIR DISCLOSURES, IF NECESSARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION COMPENSATION FOR ALL PERSONNEL, TOP TO BOTTOM, IS ORGANIZED AS A GROUP OF FIVE BANDS WITH INTERMITTENT RANGES. THE COMPENSATION RATE FOR THESE BANDS AND RANGES IS RELEVANT TO THE JOB DESCRIPTION FOR EACH POSITION. THEY WERE ESTABLISHED AS A COORDINATED EFFORT BETWEEN THE ORGANIZATION'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, PERSONNEL AND FINANCE COMMITTEES, AND MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY AND ARE REVIEWED AT 3-YEAR INTERVALS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PUBLIC AVAILABILITY OF OTHER DOCUMENTS COPIES OF THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORM 990 WILL BE PROVIDED ON REQUEST. THEY ARE ALSO AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION AT ITS OFFICE. THE FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.

PROFESSIONAL FEES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 27,091. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 2,187. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 109,262. TOTAL EXPENSES 138,540. BOOKKEEPING SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 5,608. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 2,157. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 1,804. TOTAL EXPENSES 9,569.

CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE GIFT ANNUITIES -6,753. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUSTS 8,508. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUSTS -1,000.
